function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global travel restrictions leading to decreased tourism and economic impact on conservation sites","Impact":"Decreased funding for conservation efforts and potential loss of biodiversity","Mitigation":"Developing new financial models for conservation and promoting local conservation programs","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Conservation organizations, local communities, overseas travel-dependent economies","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government, local communities"},{"Description":"Increased focus on local conservation leading to overcrowding and environmental degradation at local sites","Impact":"Negative impact on local ecosystems, increased risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable visitation practices, promoting responsible tourism, and developing new financial models for local conservation","Technologies":"Sustainable tourism technologies, visitor management systems","People":"Local communities, conservation organizations, visitors","Owner":"Local communities, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Renewed interest in national parks and conservation leading to overexploitation and disturbance of natural ecosystems","Impact":"Ecological damage, loss of biodiversity, increased risk of zoonotic transmission","Mitigation":"Educating visitors on responsible behavior, implementing visitor management systems, and strict enforcement of conservation regulations","Technologies":"Visitor management systems, surveillance technology","People":"Visitors, conservation organizations, park management","Owner":"Conservation organizations, park management"}]}
